languages.text: "Эй, святоша... а что это тебя тот еретик в лицо признал, м? Ну тот, которого мы прижали в логове вонючем? Странные у тебя друзья, вот что сказать хочу".
"Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."
languages.original_text: "Эй, святоша... а что это тебя тот еретик в лицо признал, м? Ну тот, которого мы прижали в логове вонючем? Странные у тебя друзья, вот что сказать хочу".

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “嘿，你个道貌岸然的修女……那个异端分子是怎么认出你的，嗯？你明白吧？就是我们在那个臭烘烘的巢穴里制服的那个异端分子，他怎么会认识你？不得不说，你还真是交了一群奇怪的朋友。”
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: “嘿，你个道貌岸然的修女……那个异端分子是怎么认出你的，嗯？你明白吧？就是我们在那个臭烘烘的巢穴里制服的那个异端分子，他怎么会认识你？不得不说，你还真是交了一群奇怪的朋友。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Hé, l'Adepta Sermonitas... Comment se fait-il que l'hérétique vous ait reconnue, hein ? Celui qu'on avait coincé dans ce repaire puant, là, vous vous souvenez ? Vous avez de drôles de fréquentations, je trouve. »
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: « Hé, l'Adepta Sermonitas... Comment se fait-il que l'hérétique vous ait reconnue, hein ? Celui qu'on avait coincé dans ce repaire puant, là, vous vous souvenez ? Vous avez de drôles de fréquentations, je trouve. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Eh, Adepta Santurrona... ¿Cómo es que el hereje ese te reconocía? ¿Eh? Ya sabes, al que acorralamos en su inmunda guarida. Solo digo que tienes unas amistades muy extrañas».
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: «Eh, Adepta Santurrona... ¿Cómo es que el hereje ese te reconocía? ¿Eh? Ya sabes, al que acorralamos en su inmunda guarida. Solo digo que tienes unas amistades muy extrañas».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ねえ、修道聖女会の…どうして異端者はあなたを知ってたのかしら？あのひどい巣穴で動きを縛られたのに？変わった友達がいるのね。言いたいことはそれだけよ」
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: 「ねえ、修道聖女会の…どうして異端者はあなたを知ってたのかしら？あのひどい巣穴で動きを縛られたのに？変わった友達がいるのね。言いたいことはそれだけよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hey, Adepta Scheinheiligus ... Wieso hat dieser Ketzer Euch erkannt, hmm? Ihr wisst schon, der, den wir in diesem stinkenden Versteck festgenagelt haben? Merkwürdige Freunde habt Ihr, mehr sage ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Adepta Scheinheiligus ... Wieso hat dieser Ketzer Euch erkannt, hmm? Ihr wisst schon, der, den wir in diesem stinkenden Versteck festgenagelt haben? Merkwürdige Freunde habt Ihr, mehr sage ich nicht."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."

languages.text: "Vaaz Rahibesi... Şu pis inde sıkıştırdığımız kâfir vardı ya, o seni nasıl tanıdı? Tuhaf arkadaşların var, o kadarını söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Hey, Adepta Sanctimonious... How come that heretic recognised you, hmm? You know, the one we pinned down in that stinking lair? Strange friends you've got, that's all I have to say."
